title: ERRO - Barra de ferramentas da filtragem rápida
content:
QUando uso a "Barra de ferramentas da filtragem rápida" para procurar mensagens com uma palavra específica, às vezes a mensagem não aparece nos resultados. Outras vezes, ela aparece, mas ao clicar abre uma mensagem diferente, que não corresponde ao filtro aplicado.

Já tentei reparar as pastas e entrar no "modo de solução de problemas" mas nada adiantou. Compactar todas as pastas e Ativar pesquisa global e indexação estão ativos.

Como poderia corrigir isso? Obrigado Carlos

title: カードビューからテーブルビューに変更したが、再起動するとカードビューに戻る
content: ［設定］→［外観］から［テーブルビュー］、［非スレッド］、［降順］に変更して、スレッド表示と並べ替えの設定の適用先を［既存のすべてのフォルダー］をクリックすると、起動している間はこれらの状態になっているが、Thunderbirdを終了して再起動すると設定が下に戻ってしまいます。 これは以前からではなく２ヶ月前頃から生じています。 この問題を解決する方法を教えて下さい。
creator: ess-ke

title: Can Fangda SDS Plus Hammer Drill Handle Demanding Workloads
content:
The global construction industry thrives on precision and durability, and tools like the SDS Plus Hammer Drill have become essential in handling demanding environments. Fangda has recognized this requirement, shaping its product range to reflect both strength and stability. In projects where reinforced concrete or dense stone is involved, users need instruments capable of delivering results without compromising control, and this has transformed the tool into a foundation of professional work.

Durability is central to equipment design, as tools are constantly exposed to vibration, dust, and heat during operation. A focus on material strength ensures that instruments retain their performance under such challenging conditions. With strict production control, manufacturers ensure stability, so professionals can complete their work with confidence. This approach does not just create a tool, but a long-term partner in construction efficiency.

Performance is also about accuracy. An unstable drill path can cause damage to surfaces or reduce structural integrity, increasing risks for both projects and workers. Precision engineering minimizes such issues, offering steady alignment that allows users to work faster while maintaining quality. This balance between speed and accuracy is what distinguishes high-level manufacturing from ordinary production.

Adaptability has also become increasingly important. Construction sites rarely present uniform materials, and the ability to transition across applications is crucial. Instruments designed with versatile performance allow workers to complete a range of tasks without interruption. Such adaptability represents modern thinking, where professional needs are met with thoughtful engineering solutions that combine usability with resilience.

Reputation plays a significant role when professionals select their tools. Global industries look for manufacturers whose products consistently perform, as trust is built over time through tested results. This connection between brand and user transforms the relationship from simple supply to reliable partnership. It also ensures that tools maintain their place as essential assets in workshops and job sites worldwide.

Sustainability is another rising topic across industries, with users paying closer attention to the environmental impact of equipment production. Factories that adopt efficient processes and responsible material sourcing provide assurance to customers seeking reliable tools without unnecessary waste. This broader approach strengthens both reputation and responsibility.

In summary, it continues to integrate strength, precision, and adaptability into construction equipment, and details on SDS Plus Hammer Drill and related tools can be found at https://www.fangda-tools.com/product/ where professionals may explore further.

title: Configurazione PEC
content: Buongiorno. Ho installato Thunderbird da parecchio e non ho mai avuto problemi. La prima volta ho configurato tutti i miei indirizzi mail compresa la PEC in automatico e tutto è andato liscio. Ora, siccome ho dovuto cambiare la password della PEC naturalmente Thunderbird mi chiede di aggiornala. Cosa che ho provato a fare ma non la accetta. (notare che sulla PEC di Poste dove ho l'account è funzionante, ed ho fatto copia incolla per non sbagliare) Siccome non trovavo le impostazioni per modificare la password, ho eliminato l'account ed ora nella procedura di creazione, non la accetta, La procedura si ferma all'inserimento del nome utente. Posso sapere come mai? Grazie Giancarlo
creator: giancarlo.montin

title: Unable to copy messages
content:
Hello,

I have a problem with copying emails (a large number of them) from a POP3 account to an IMAP account. I have created both accounts in Thunderbird, but when I select the messages to be copied, a message appears for about a second saying that copying is starting, and then it disappears and no process is started. Sometimes I can copy a small number, for example 100 messages, and other times I can't copy anything. The problem is definitely not with the IMAP server limits.

Please help me find out where the problem might be.

title: Expanding and collapsing folders when dragging a message
content:
I am using Thunderbird 128. I have some folders that have subfolders in my folder pane. To keep all the top-level folders in view, I prefer to keep all the folders collapsed (so that their subfolders are not immediately visible). However, when I want to move an email message into a subfolder of a top-level folder, I now have to expand the folder, drag the message into the subfolder, and then collapse folder to declutter the view on separate steps. It is a bit of a nuisance.

I remember that, at some point, the folders were expanded when a message is dragged on top of them and then even collapsed after the message is moved to a subfolder. I cannot find any settings to do this at this point. Is this still possible? And, if so, how do I achieve it?
creator: tugkan

title: Emails linked together, is this called threaded?
content:
Since a recent update, I am finding Thunderbird almost unusable.

Problem: It is linking emails together that I want to be separate. It shows a little arrow next to the Subject. Is this called Threading?

I just discovered replies to emails this morning in these threads that have not shown up to me as a new email coming in. I've just taken people to task for not responding, when they actually did... days ago.

I can't find any way of stopping the emails linking together. I need all these linked emails to be separated.

I just sent a test email to myself. Then sent a separate test email to myself with the same subject title and they are now linked together. I can't use a system like this.

I've unticked the 'Thread' command in the drop down menu, but that doesn't help.

Is it possible to unlink them all?

Thank you. David Ashworth.

NOTE: I do send you a monthly donation.
creator: dave116
